data.text:
Delek US Holdings, Inc. is pleased to announce the successful go-live of SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) Planning, marking a significant milestone in our transition from Excel-based planning to a robust, state-of-the-art system. This achievement enables enhanced forecasting, planning, and leadership insights, supporting our 2025 budgeting. Key modules include Gross Margin, Head Count, and Expense Planning. Special thanks to Delek IT, FP&A, HR, and Applexus Technologies for their dedication and collaboration in delivering this transformative project on time and on budget. ü¶æüöÄ Leaders - Ashley Dubler , John Paul , Megan Murray , Narayan Bhusal,MBA #technologytransformation #digitalization #innovation

We're delighted to have hosted a highly successful inaugural AI Summit at Delek US Holdings, Inc. surpassing expectations with exceptional attendance and engagement. I offer sincere thanks to our organizing team, speakers, partners and leadership for their vision and support. I'm especially proud of our forward-thinking approach to generative AI adoption, balanced with responsible AI practices, as exemplified by our legal team's insightful presentation #AISummit #Innovation #DigitalTransformation #AI #delektech

It was an honor to join the esteemed MIT CDOIQ Forum in Boston, surrounded by global data leaders and visionaries! I had the privilege of presenting Delek US Holdings, Inc.‚Äôs technology #revolution, a testament to our commitment to innovation and excellence. This marks a special milestone, as I presented EL AL Israel Airlines‚Äô transformation just two years ago, shortly before my move to the United States üá∫üá∏ The opportunity to share experiences, exchange ideas, and learn from the best of the best is truly invaluable. Thank you to the MIT #CDOIQ community for the platform and the connections. #MITCDOIQ #DataLeaders #Innovation #DigitalTransformation #technology #ai

Happy 4th of July! üá∫üá∏ Today, as we celebrate America's birthday, I'm grateful to mark a personal milestone - it's been 2 incredible years since my family and I made Tennessee our new home. We've loved becoming part of this vibrant community and are proud to call it our own. As a member of Delek US Holdings, Inc. executive team, headquartered here in Brentwood, Tennessee, I'm grateful for the opportunity to be part of a company that shares the values of hard work, community, and freedom that this great nation was founded on. Wishing you and your loved ones a joyful Independence Day, and looking forward to many more years of growth, connection, and community in the Volunteer State! Thank you Avigal Soreq for the opportunity. Grateful for my team, colleagues and partners for making this a successful Journey ü¶æüöÄ #FourthOfJuly #IndependenceDay #DelekUSHoldings #TennesseeProud"

Mid-year planning at Delek US Holdings, Inc. has been a resounding success! üöÄ I want to extend a huge appreciation to our teams who are driving our company forward with their curiosity and tech savviness: üôè - Our Legal Department for embracing #AI to become the best version of themselves - Denise McWatters, BS, MA, JD, CCEP-I & Misty Lavender Foy - Our Finance Team for spearheading industry-leading technology adoption, setting a new standard for excellence Reuven Spiegel Robert Wright Ashley Dubler - Our Commercial Team for being a driving force in our business, leveraging #technology to stay ahead of the curve Patrick Reilly And many more culture-changing agents who are pushing boundaries and making a significant #impact! Driven by our CEO Avigal Soreq Our #focused #alignment as a team has been the main outcome of our mid-year planning, and I'm thrilled to see everyone working together towards a common goal. We're now more prepared than ever to tackle the challenges ahead with full force.ü¶æ Let's keep innovating, disrupting, and driving success together! #DelekUSHoldings #Innovation #TechSavvy #MidYearPlanning #TeamWork #CultureOfExcellence

'The future has already happened, it just isn't very well distributed.' - William Gibson I was honored to attend the AI in Energy event in #Houston and share my thoughts on Delek US Holdings, Inc.' AI journey alongside Erin Boyd (The AES Corporation ), Brent Railey (Chevron Phillips Chemical Company ) and moderated by Laura Tibodeau Embracing #AI requires a forward-thinking mindset to surf the wave üèÑ‚ôÇÔ∏è of change, and not get swept away. üåä Let's continue shaping the future of energy together! üöÄ #AIinEnergy #DigitalTransformation #technologytransformation #InnovationMindset DK Innovation (US), Inc.
